Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

![Image 85](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

How do I know what plan is right for me?

How do I know what plan is right for me?

Our individual plans are ideal if you're looking for a single solution, such as a form builder, document generator, or eSignature app. However, if you need all these solutions, Formstack's Suite plan is your best option. Suite includes access to all of our primary apps, plus key features like Workspace and Workflows. If you're aiming for organization-wide digital enablement, our Enterprise plan can be customized to your needs.

‍

![Image 86](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

What does "user" mean?

What does user mean?

Across Forms, Documents, and Sign, users have accounts within Formstack that allow them to build across our different apps. There are various levels of permissions and roles that you can assign to users to ensure the right people have access to varying levels of information and functionality.

‍

![Image 87](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

What if I need more users, submissions, or merges on my account?

What if I need more users on my account

Easy! Once you sign up for a plan, you can add more users, add-on features, and submissions or merges as you see fit. Our sales team is a perfect resource to point you in the right direction for the plan that suits your needs.

![Image 88](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

What happens at the end of my trial?

What happens at the end of my trial?

After your trial ends, you can purchase the plan you're on or choose another plan.

‍

![Image 89](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

How does a free trial work?

How does a free trial work?

Depending on the product and plan you choose, you’ll get 14 days of access with the opportunity to purchase during your trial. At the end of your trial, you will have to purchase your plan if you want to continue accessing your forms, documents, and workflows.

‍

![Image 90](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

Do I need advanced technical skills or professional support to implement Formstack?

Do I need advanced technical skills or professional support to implement Formstack?

Not at all! As a no-code company, we want to ensure our tools can be used by non-technical teams. For more technical users, we have features and functionality that can take Formstack even further.

![Image 91](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

Do you provide customer support?

Do you provide customer support?

We offer a variety of support channels, including a support site with full documentation, feature requests, and walk-through videos. We also provide email support during normal business hours (7 a.m. - 7 p.m. ET on Monday - Friday) to give you personalized customer service. Depending on your plan, you can also get scheduled phone support.

![Image 92](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ebb0930dd82631397ddca92/5f31b28b63bf1f9adff8c969_icon-pricing-dropdown-mobile-arrow.svg)

What type of payment do you accept?

What type of payment do you accept?

We take Mastercard, Visa, Discover, and American Express. Annual invoices are available for certain plans. The nonprofit discount applies to invoices, but the annual discount does not.

Ready to get started?
---------------------

Learn how our low-code application platform can help you  
automate the mundane and accelerate the work that matters.

[Connect With Us](https://www.formstack.com/contact-sales)
